titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Governance and Public Policy (GPP)
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Governance and Public Policy (GPP) FA1684

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-12-16 07:19:00 -0500.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Governance and Public Policy (GPP)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of program files and office files.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
